labels.name: story
labels.value: TC_RF_001 - Validate the functionality of Register Account.

name: Validate fields don't accept only spaces
description: Verify that mandatory fields do not accept only spaces as input

steps.name: Fill registration form with details: First Name:    , Last Name:    , Email:
Get all error messages from the form

parameters.name: errorLocators
parameters.value: [By.xpath: //div[contains(text(), 'First Name must be between')], By.xpath: //div[contains(text(), 'Last Name must be between')], By.xpath: //input[@id='input-email']/following-sibling::div, By.xpath: //input[@id='input-telephone']/following-sibling::div, By.xpath: //input[@id='input-password']/following-sibling::div]

parameters.name: expectedMessages
parameters.value: [First Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!, Last Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!, E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!, Telephone must be between 3 and 32 characters!, Password must be between 4 and 20 characters!]

parameters.name: actualErrors
parameters.value: [First Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!, Last Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!, E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!, Password must be between 4 and 20 characters!]
